author: StevenTravelCaptainRogers

text:
I needed a little while to actually get into this game, since it really didn't age very well. But I repeatedly told myself to give it a chance; to get into the atmosphere, to believe in the characters and story, and to admire the obvious love and care that was put into so many parts of this game.
If you enjoy RPGs that deserve the "RP" in their description and you happen to have some spare time, I definitely recommend this game. Just have some patience with it and allow it to grow on you.
author: Beremor

text:
Witcher 1 is hard to get into because it definitely has not aged well. Both visuals and gameplay are lacking. But i definitely recommend a buy. Even if you end up finishing the story by watching it on Youtube ^^. It is worth it just to have a better understanding of the jaw-dropping Witcher 2. IMO one of the best video-game stories out there to date and very fun to play. Not to mention it has fantastic visuals.
(also it's recommended to get both on GOG. You'll get more extras and they are drm-free)
